anomalies.description: AI detected multiple failed login attempts from suspicious IP.
Structured investigation triggered due to anomalous behavior pattern.

risk_factors: AI-detected failed login from new device in different region/country
Structured pattern recognition flagged unusual access sequence
risk_assessment.summary: Structured AI analysis detected high-risk activity: User had successful login from US followed by immediate failed login from India on new device. AI recommends immediate investigation.

splunk_data.ai_analysis: Structured detection: Geographic anomaly detected - impossible travel scenario

structured_insights.pattern_analysis: AI detected impossible travel scenario between US and India within 5 minutes
structured_insights.risk_escalation: Structured system escalated to high priority due to geographic anomaly
